replies.body: I voted depends on situation because idk your punishment history. If youve had a 14 day ban already then yes permaban time. If you havent, then its fucked up they would escalate that to a permaban. Stop blaming your team all the time. You know when you say "jg diff" or "mid diff" it means youre blaming them for the loss. Idk if you realize that, or if you just copy trendy phrases without knowing the meaning.

at the 14 day ban card it tells you that this is your last warning and the slightest misbehavior will result in a permaban.

6 lines in you alrdy said youre done and you asked the enemys to report your entire team for trolling. i also stopped reading from there.

you broke 3 rules on your last chance.
what did you expect was going to happen? 

what im really shocked about is the fact that you had (at least) 1 punishement before, yet insisted on totally ignoring the rules and how the system works and now you go "why wtf???"

just 1 quick google search for a faq of the IFS woudl tell you that asking to report has only 1 effect: you can get punished for it. because 1 report does as much as 9 and its just negative behavior.

if you make a new acc, now you know better (i hope)
I had people saying to kms in game but i didnt had a feedback report. meanning saying to report someone is more toxic than litterally tell someone to khs wow

you got something very wrong.

this isnt about "how toxic" something is.
you can call ppl noob, if you do that over several 100 games you will be banned for it because it is toxic. yes its not as toxic as other stuff, but its still toxic and doing it enough times results in a punishement.

the "extreme" stuff just speeds things up.
the "0 tolerance phrases" just result in a 14 day ban right away.

and one thing i hate: you VERY RARELY get a feedback message about your report doing something. it sucks. i hate it. but sadly thats the way it is.

I know that after the 14 days ban I am on thin ice. I know i got perma bc of that, but tbh riot banning system should be fix. High elo players and even old employes said the same. Free speech is getting attack. No way that i said something very bad or even harrassed someone is my text. I have another gold account ill just mute all every game cause saying someone to stop pushing and feed is now considering harrassing lmao

actually telling someone to stop feed isnt harassement, its just stupid.

theres only 2 scenarios

1. the person is having a bad game. you going "stop feed" is not helping in any way lol. its like telling someone with a broken leg to stop drowning after throwing them into the ocean

2. the person is a troll and you getting triggered by them is exactly what they want. they want your salty tears.

also theres a difference between saying something out loud and writing something. many ppl still come to these boards saying tyler1 should be banned because he is still flaming. yes he is SHOUTING OUT LOUD IN REALITY. riot cant punish you for that. but for misbehaving in their game and chat they can

> Free speech is getting attack.

Wait what?  Rito banned you, not the government.  Your free speech is intact I assure you.

MOST of the time you won't receive an ifr if someone got punished from your report
So, you not receiving an ifr doesn't mean they didn't get punished
It just means that you weren't informed about their punishment

Riot only rarely gives a feedback report when someone you report gets punished, that way it's supposed to somewhat prevent you from being able to tell who has punished, and the idea is that they don't want people trying to game the system or something and figure out how to get people they simply dislike punished.
